biotools.summary: Identifying chemogenetic interactions from CRISPR screens with drugZ | DrugZ software from the Hart Lab | Critically, the "gene" column must be the first non-index column in the file, and the column headers are used on the command line. For example, to execute DrugZ analyzing just the A and B replicates of this file, the command line would be:
